product_name: Patagonia Baby Down Sweater Vest - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: The insulated Patagonia Baby Down sweater vest buffers young boys' bellies during serene trail walks with Dad or epic stroller wheelies with Mom. Ripstop polyester shell is tear resistant and windproof; water-repellent finish causes snow and rain to bead up and roll off. Premium European 600-fill-power goose down insulation is extremely warm, lightweight and compressible. Baby Down Sweater vest has a full-zip front, windflap, zippered hand pockets with reflective zipper pulls and an ID label inside.
short_description: The insulated Patagonia Baby Down sweater vest buffers young boys' bellies during serene trail walks with Dad or epic stroller wheelies with Mom.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
